title: 820-3115-B bad ram slot
message: Hi, i have a 820-3115-B with the usual bad bottom ram slot. Is it possible to replace the entire RAM bay assembly, or to reinforce the bad soldering that may be causing the issue? Thank you.

title: 820-3115-B bad ram slot
message:
Max the good slot and leave it as is.
You can try to resolder, but do not waste more time.

title: 820-3115-B bad ram slot
message:
I noticed one of the solder balls was detached from the motherboard. I resoldered it. The thing is the plastic clips are all broken so cant test it.

Thank you.

title: 820-3115-B bad ram slot
message: You can rework the outer row of pins with the soldering iron but it's not possible to rework the inner rows. This could last long enough or fail again very soon though, not really a proper fix so better max out the working slot.
